arguments.argument:
/*Stages: 0: Setup/Initial 1: Red captain 2: Blue captain 3: Pick teams 4: Map picking 5: pug started */
stage=0 //setup alarm[0]=30/global.delta_factor mix=0 war=0 pug=0
redCaptain=-1 blueCaptain=-1
pickingPlayers=ds_list_create() pickingList=""
pickedPlayer=-1 pickedPlayerTeam=-1 pickedColour=C_GREEN
teamToPick=0 //0=red, 1=blue, 2=spec, 3=any pickNumber=1 maxPicks=(global.pugVotePicks*2)-2
mapsPickedCount=0 mapPickerTeam=1 mapList=ds_list_create()
event_user(2)
redScore=0 blueScore=0 drawScore=0 gamesPlayed=0
warRedOk=0 warBlueOk=0
